app_description.message: A simple addon that blocks embedded Twitch streams on websites. No longer will unwanted Twitch streams auto play, when you are browsing wiki pages or other websites.

popup_description.message: This extension blocks embedded Twitch streams on websites.

popup_script_on.message: Twitch blocker is currently removing iframes and actively blocking embedded Twitch streams

popup_script_off.message: Twitch blocker is currently disabled for this website
